column2:
Primary cut-off time for third party 
transactions
column3:
Close for new transactions (for T + 0) in favour of third parties, 
except for bank-to-bank (MT2XX series).

column2:
Cut-off time for Participant managed 
ILF Repo creation
column3: Participants should not initiate ILF Repos after 1135 hrs.
SDF and SLF windows are closed for Participants at 1135 hrs.
